00032 #ifndef __LWIP_ICMP_H__
00033 #define __LWIP_ICMP_H__
00034 
00035 #include "lwip/arch.h"
00036 
00037 #include "lwip/opt.h"
00038 #include "lwip/pbuf.h"
00039 
00040 #include "lwip/netif.h"
00041 
00042 #define ICMP6_DUR  1
00043 #define ICMP6_TE   3
00044 #define ICMP6_ECHO 128    /* echo */
00045 #define ICMP6_ER   129      /* echo reply */
00046 
00047 
00048 enum icmp_dur_type {
00049   ICMP_DUR_NET = 0,    /* net unreachable */
00050   ICMP_DUR_HOST = 1,   /* host unreachable */
00051   ICMP_DUR_PROTO = 2,  /* protocol unreachable */
00052   ICMP_DUR_PORT = 3,   /* port unreachable */
00053   ICMP_DUR_FRAG = 4,   /* fragmentation needed and DF set */
00054   ICMP_DUR_SR = 5      /* source route failed */
00055 };
00056 
00057 enum icmp_te_type {
00058   ICMP_TE_TTL = 0,     /* time to live exceeded in transit */
00059   ICMP_TE_FRAG = 1     /* fragment reassembly time exceeded */
00060 };
00061 
00062 void icmp_input(struct pbuf *p, struct netif *inp);
00063 
00064 void icmp_dest_unreach(struct pbuf *p, enum icmp_dur_type t);
00065 void icmp_time_exceeded(struct pbuf *p, enum icmp_te_type t);
00066 
00067 struct icmp_echo_hdr {
00068   u8_t type;
00069   u8_t icode;
00070   u16_t chksum;
00071   u16_t id;
00072   u16_t seqno;
00073 };
00074 
00075 struct icmp_dur_hdr {
00076   u8_t type;
00077   u8_t icode;
00078   u16_t chksum;
00079   u32_t unused;
00080 };
00081 
00082 struct icmp_te_hdr {
00083   u8_t type;
00084   u8_t icode;
00085   u16_t chksum;
00086   u32_t unused;
00087 };
00088 
00089 #endif /* __LWIP_ICMP_H__ */
